abstract: New York Road Runners Club, which for decades has organized the New York City Marathon, is unveiling a new logo, a redesigned Web site and a manifesto, all intended to capture the evolving role and spirit of the organization.
snippet: The club that has for decades organized the New York City Marathon is unveiling a new look on Monday, the better to emphasize its broader mission as fitness promoters.
lead_paragraph: The club that has for decades organized the New York City Marathon is unveiling a new look on Monday, the better to emphasize its broader mission as fitness promoters.

headline.main: Road Runners’ Manifesto: More Than Marathoners
headline.print_headline: Road Runners’ Manifesto: More Than Marathoners
headline.seo: New York Road Runners Rebrands to Emphasize Broader Mission
